definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
from this, it can be seen that...

sentences.english: Jia-wen Luo do the experimental investigation and make a research summary and finish the research report.
sentences.chinese: 由罗家文进行实验探究并将成果汇总并制成研究报告。

sentences.english: Made of specially-treated material, the coat is light in weight and machine washable.
sentences.chinese: 该大衣由经过特殊处理的面料做成，重量轻，可机洗。

sentences.english: The second is that a systematic error exists, resulting from the attrition voltage and contact electric potential difference.
sentences.chinese: 存在一个由消耗电压与接触电势差导致的系统误差。

sentences.english: Permissions will be controlled by a business manager or IT administrator.
sentences.chinese: 权限将由业务经理或IT管理员控制。

sentences.english: Learn how to handle setbacks. Life is made of ups, downs, and disappointments.
sentences.chinese: 学会如何处理挫折，生活由顺利，挫折和失望构成。

sentences.english: It's edited by Jahan Ramazani, formerly a Teaching Fellow in this course.
sentences.chinese: 由之前的一个教学人员让，拉马扎尼所编。

sentences.english: The tolls, which include a government passage tax, varied from $4 to $30 per vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 隧道收费连政府通过税，每程由4元至30元不等。

sentences.english: The explosion was caused by a burst gas pipe .
sentences.chinese: 这次爆炸是由一个爆裂的煤气管引起的。

sentences.english: Are you willing to return, escorted by me?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意回去吗，由我来护送？

sentences.english: It was abridged from the original work.
Transregional inspection shall be organized by a higher-level TLIA.
sentences.chinese: 跨区域征费稽查的，由上一级交通征费稽查机构组织。

sentences.english: The previous record was held by an Indian man who delivered a 120-hour speech.
sentences.chinese: 此前的纪录为120小时，由一个印度人创造。

sentences.english: The expenses on advertising and sales promotion will be shared between our two parties.
sentences.chinese: 广告和促销的费用由我们双方均摊。

sentences.english: Island group from the volcanic island and cays .
sentences.chinese: 岛群由火山岛和珊瑚礁组成。

sentences.english: The scheme is mainly composed of center station and substation.
sentences.chinese: 方案由调度中心站和子站组成。

definition: to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
